name: Extreme Motor Mania
description:
Extreme Motor Mania is a physics-based bike racing game. Ride your bike through amazing tracks with jumps and loops. Just play Extreme Motor Mania to overcome obstacles and collect treasures through stunningly environments full of danger! The game is funny and challenging.

Touch the screen to tilt your bike and accelerate/brake.

Please remember you must reach the goal as fast as possible to get the most stars to win the race.
My lovely riders, grab your bike and keep up with us! Beware of sharp-cut spikes, breaking glass, exploding bombs and stormy wind zones.

Game Features:
- Physics-Based Gameplay
Make you actually feel the differences between different environments and bikes.
-Easy to Ride, Hard to Master
Accelerate and tilt your bike by simply touching the screen, and variety obstacles will take your breath.
-200 Exciting Challenging Tracks
Each track is unique and well-designed. Better yet, more great tracks are coming soon!
-Variety of Themes
Ride your bike in more than 25 countries and regions, even out of the earth!
-Unique Motorcycles
Every motorcycle in Extreme Motor Mania is the one and only. Collect them and get more driving experience.
